wikipedia_page.main: Khairat Al-Saleh, born in Jerusalem and educated in Syria and Egypt, is a noted painter in the Hurufiyya movement and a ceramicist, glassmaker and printmaker.

response: *Khairat Al-Saleh (born 1940) Ali, W., Modern Islamic Art: Development and Continuity, University of Florida Press, 1997, pp 165-66
* Khairat Al-Saleh (born 1940), painter, ceramicist, glassmaker and printmaker

: Works that adhere to the rules of 13th-century calligraphy. An example of this is the work of Khairat Al-Saleh (b. 1940)Ali, W., Modern Islamic Art: Development and Continuity, University of Florida Press, 1997, p. 165
